018package org.opengis.filter;
019
020import org.opengis.util.CodeList;
021import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
022import org.opengis.geoapi.internal.Vocabulary;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.CONDITIONAL;
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.ISO_19143;
026
027
028/**
029 * Nature of the comparison between expressions. A standard set of comparison operators is equal to,
030 * less than, greater than, less than or equal to, greater than or equal to and not equal to.
031 *
032 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (Geomatys)
033 * @version 3.1
034 * @since   3.1
035 */
036@Vocabulary(capacity=10)
037@UML(identifier="BinaryComparisonName", specification=ISO_19143)
038public final class ComparisonOperatorName extends CodeList<ComparisonOperatorName> {
039    /**
040     * Serial number for compatibility with different versions.
041     */
042    private static final long serialVersionUID = -6384249667390069781L;
043
044    /**
045     * Filter operator that compares that its two sub-expressions are equal to each other.
046     */
047    @UML(identifier="PropertyIsEqualTo", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
048    public static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_EQUAL_TO = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_EQUAL_TO");
049
050    /**
051     * Filter operator that compares that its two sub-expressions are not equal to each other.
052     */
053    @UML(identifier="PropertyIsNotEqualTo", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
054    public static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_NOT_EQUAL_TO = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_NOT_EQUAL_TO");
055
056    /**
057     * Filter operator that checks that its first sub-expression is less than its second sub-expression.
058     */
059    @UML(identifier="PropertyIsLessThan", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
060    public static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_LESS_THAN = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_LESS_THAN");
061
062    /**
063     * Filter operator that checks that its first sub-expression is greater than its second sub-expression.
064     */
065    @UML(identifier="PropertyIsGreaterThan", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
066    public static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_GREATER_THAN = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_GREATER_THAN");
067
068    /**
069     * Filter operator that checks that its first sub-expression is less than or equal to its second sub-expression.
070     */
071    @UML(identifier="PropertyIsLessThanOrEqualTo", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
072    public static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO");
073
074    /**
075     * Filter operator that checks that its first sub-expression is greater or equal to its second sub-expression.
076     */
077    @UML(identifier="PropertyIsGreaterThanOrEqualTo", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19143)
078    public static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO");
079
080    /**
081     * Default value for {@link BetweenComparisonOperator#getOperatorType()}.
082     */
083    static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_BETWEEN = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_BETWEEN");
084
085    /**
086     * Default value for {@link LikeOperator#getOperatorType()}.
087     */
088    static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_LIKE = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_LIKE");
089
090    /**
091     * Default value for {@link NullOperator#getOperatorType()}.
092     */
093    static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_NULL = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_NULL");
094
095    /**
096     * Default value for {@link NilOperator#getOperatorType()}.
097     */
098    static final ComparisonOperatorName PROPERTY_IS_NIL = new ComparisonOperatorName("PROPERTY_IS_NIL");
099
100    /**
101     * Constructs an element of the given name.
102     *
103     * @param name  the name of the new element. This name shall not be in use by another element of this type.
104     */
105    private ComparisonOperatorName(final String name) {
106        super(name);
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Returns the list of {@code ComparisonOperatorName}s.
111     *
112     * @return the list of codes declared in the current JVM.
113     */
114    public static ComparisonOperatorName[] values() {
115        return values(ComparisonOperatorName.class);
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Returns the list of codes of the same kind as this code list element.
120     * Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking {@link #values()}, except that
121     * this method can be invoked on an instance of the parent {@code CodeList} class.
122     *
123     * @return all code {@linkplain #values() values} for this code list.
124     */
125    @Override
126    public ComparisonOperatorName[] family() {
127        return values();
128    }
129
130    /**
131     * Returns the comparison operators that matches the given string, or returns a new one if none match it.
132     * This methods returns the first instance (in declaration order) for which the {@linkplain #name() name}
133     * is {@linkplain String#equalsIgnoreCase(String) equals, ignoring case}, to the given name.
134     * If no existing instance is found, then a new one is created for the given name.
135     *
136     * @param  code  the name of the code to fetch or to create.
137     * @return a code matching the given name.
138     */
139    public static ComparisonOperatorName valueOf(String code) {
140        return valueOf(ComparisonOperatorName.class, code, ComparisonOperatorName::new).get();
141    }
142}
